Functions: C-glycosides serve as stable mimics of glycosides by replacing the anomeric oxygen with a carbon atom, which suppresses the reactivity of the anomeric center. Functions: 2-Deoxynojirimycin (2-DNJ) is a mimic of glucose, specifically targeting enzymes involved in carbohydrate metabolism. Activity: Type 2 Diabetes: Miglitol (a DNJ derivative) inhibits intestinal α-glucosidases, reducing postprandial hyperglycemia
